titleStmt.title: The triumphs of the Prince d'Amour A masque presented by His Highnesse at his pallace in the Middle Temple, the 24th of Februarie 1635.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

titleStmt.title: The triumphs of the Prince d'Amour A masque presented by His Highnesse at his pallace in the Middle Temple, the 24th of Februarie 1635.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Richard Meighen, next to the Middle Temple gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: VV.D., i.e. William D'Avenant.
With a preliminary privilege leaf dated "February. 1635." Variant: leaf dated "February the xixth. 1635.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Richard Meighen, next to the Middle Temple gate
